ghostPost.title: What We Do
ghostPost.excerpt:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of
the open source Decentralized Social Networking Protocol
[https://www.dsnp.org/hello-world/] (DSNP). The organization fits within the
umbrella of Project Liberty [https://www.projectliberty.io/] as the provider of
one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different
technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and
Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished
ghostPost.plaintext:
DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of
the open source Decentralized Social Networking Protocol
[https://www.dsnp.org/hello-world/] (DSNP). The organization fits within the
umbrella of Project Liberty [https://www.projectliberty.io/] as the provider of
one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different
technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and
Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs
[https://www.unfinishedlabs.io/] as part of their efforts to build public
infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative,
inclusive web economy.
ghostPost.html: DSNP.org is an independent non-profit organization, focused on stewardship of the open source Decentralized Social Networking Protocol (DSNP). The organization fits within the umbrella of Project Liberty as the provider of one core component (the social graph protocol) that connects the many different technologies that make up a decentralized social network. Both DSNP.org and Project Liberty have been launched out of Unfinished Labs as part of their efforts to build public infrastructure for the web that puts citizens at the center of an innovative, inclusive web economy.
